keyMappings:
map l goNext
map h goBack
map w scrollUp
map s scrollDown
map a goBack
map d goNext
map q previousTab
map e nextTab
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
np: https://search.nixos.org/packages?channel=unstable&type=packages&query=%s NixPackages
no: https://search.nixos.org/options?channel=unstable&type=packages&query=%s NixOptions
hm: https://mipmip.github.io/home-manager-option-search/?%s HomeManager
dp: https://www.deepl.com/en/translator#ja/en/%s deepL
js: https://jisho.org/search/%s jisho
